title: [1.12.2][MekanismOres——通用机械矿石]用MEK增产所有的矿石
author: 東風
txt_content:
作者的介绍
MekanismOres is a Mekanism addon that provides support for various other ores in its ore processing chain.

Mekanism has widely been accepted as the highest-throughput ore processing mod available: a full processing chain can produce five units of metal per unit of ore. The drawbacks to this, however, are that the process is very expensive to build and maintain and that the process only works for vanilla ores and ores offered by Mekanism itself.

This mod aims to solve the second problem: it adds ore quintupling support for various other metals registered by several different mods. Ever wanted to make way too much manyullyn for no good reason? Here's your solution!

通用机械矿石是通用机械MOD的扩展，添加了通用机械的矿物增产链对很多其他模组矿石的支持。
通用机械是公认的高产量矿物处理模组，一套完整的矿物处理能把矿石产量翻五倍。
但是它的缺陷是，矿物处理流程的搭建和维护都非常贵，而且只支持原版矿物和通用机械自带的矿物。

这个模组就是要解决第二个问题：它添加了大量模组的矿物的五倍增产支持。
想五倍增产玛玉灵？那就用这个模组吧！



目前支持的矿物有这些：
Uranium
Yellorium
Nickel
Platinum
Iridium
Mithril
Aluminium
Cobalt
Ardite
Starmetal
Draconium
Beryllium
Boron
Lithium
Magnesium
Thorium
Zirconium
Titanium
Desh
Carbon
Dark Iron
Tungsten
Zinc
Mercury
Palladium
Adamantine
Alduorite
Astral Silver
Atlarus
Carmot
Ceruclase
Deep Iron
Eximite
Ignatius
Infuscolium
Kalendrite
Lemurite
Manganese
Meutoite
Midasium
Orichalcum
Oureclase
Prometheum
Rubracium
Sanguinite
Shadow Iron
Vulcanite
Vyroxeres
Tiberium
Aurorium
Duranite
Valyrium
Vibranium
Karmesine
Ovium
Jauxum
Uru
Osram
Eezo
Abyssum
Vanadium
Baronyte
Blazium
Elecanium
Emberstone
Ghastly Ore
Ghoulish Ore
Limonite
Lyon
Mystite
Rosite
Varsium
Tritanium
涉及到的MOD很多，我翻译不过来，就暂时这样了。
有知道这些是什么矿物的可以回复在下面，我会写上去。

如果对你有帮助，请回复/评分为搬运工加油。
